thread.title: Surprising foreign Valentine's Day traditions infographic | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Surprising foreign Valentine's Day traditions infographic | Daily Mail Online

author: Annabel Fenwick Elliott For Mailonline
title: Surprising foreign Valentine's Day traditions infographic | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Roses banned in Saudi Arabia and gifts for men ONLY in Japan: Surprising Valentine's Day traditions from around the world revealed In Japan, women don't receive gifts from men, they give them - although the favour is returned a month later Saudi Arabia has banned Valentine's Day altogether, but there does exist a black market for red roses In South Africa, women write down the name of the person they desire and pin it to their sleeves
